name: Alejandra Torres
descriptions: Alejandra Torres is a freedwoman working with Hannibal Hamlin as a teacher at the Temple of the Union in Fallout 3.
Alejandra is a quiet woman of great intelligence.
A free person again at 21, Alejandra joined Hannibal, becoming the group's teacher, historian, and tinkerer.
Alejandra is fiercely loyal to Hamlin and fully believes in the dream of once more building a world in which all men are created equal and free.

topics.response_text: Can't talk now. We've heard Slavers are attacking.

topics.topic_text: Why do you think I should swear my allegiance to this place?
topics.response_text: We keep the dream alive. The dream of a free world where all men are created equal.
He is the Great Emancipator. He freed all the slaves over a hundred years before the bombs dropped.

topics.topic_text: So, you used to be a slave?
topics.response_text: Yes. For four years. I was young and pretty. I don't need to tell you what my duties were.

topics.topic: MS06TempleUnionWhat are a bunch of escaped slaves doing holed up here?
topics.topic_text: Why are all of you hiding in this place?
topics.response_text: We're all runaways. Hannibal wants to make this a place for all escaped slaves, but it's too small.
I'm an historian. I also tinker with pre-war machines.

conversation.response_text: I've got nothing to say until Hannibal says you're okay.
